thread.title: Comfortable Casablanca -
thread.title_full: Comfortable Casablanca - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jill J
title: Comfortable Casablanca -
text: Comfortable hotel with lovely attentive staff. Extremely good location on Times Square and we've stayed here before. A little more variety on the breakfast menu would be appreciated but all in all a great stay in a comfortable friendly hotel right in the thick of the Manhattan action. Thank you Casablanca :)
